dct_title_s: Sarmatia et Scythia, Russia et Tartaria Europaea
dct_description_sm: Covers European Russia, most of Scandinavia, Romania, and Bulgaria. Extends south to the Black Sea, northern Caucasus, and northern Caspian Sea.
Appears in Clüver's Introductio in universam geographiam, 1697.
dct_rights_sm: Images from the The Renaissance Exploration Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
